query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS workshopAccessRequests (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  workshopId INT NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('pending', 'approved', 'rejected') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  tokensUsed INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  requestedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  reviewedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  reviewedBy INT NULL,
  adminNotes TEXT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3Mhpd8nk54dx6w3.root --database e9RJaE3TPmF4zsnh5FSQoP --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS workshopAccessRequests (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  workshopId INT NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('pending', 'approved', 'rejected') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  tokensUsed INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  requestedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  reviewedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  reviewedBy INT NULL,
  adminNotes TEXT NULL
);
